short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take YouTube with you; wherever you browse or work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkTube is a Google Chrome Extension that allows users browsing the web to easily search YouTube without leaving their page. Whether you want to reference a video in your research, share a captivating clip with friends, or bookmark a tutorial for later, LinkTube makes it effortless to access and share YouTube content.

With a mission to improve coach, creator, and operator workflows, LinkTube strives to provide innovative solutions that empower users to navigate the web more efficiently.

With this extension, users can easily highlight text on a web page, run a command, and choose from a selection of YouTube videos to hyperlink. This eliminates the manual process of searching for videos, copying URLs, and creating hyperlinks, saving users time and effort. Users can also open the extension and search YouTube from any web page at any time. 

Just press Alt+Shift+L on your keyboard to activate the extension.
